entries: The Rat Prince takes the {@action Dash|XPHB}, {@action Disengage|XPHB}, or {@action Hide|XPHB} action.

reaction.name: Sacrificial Pawn
entries: {@actTrigger} The Rat Prince is targeted by an attack or spell that targets only him. {@actResponse} The Rat Prince redirects the attack or spell to another ratling within 5 feet of him, causing the ratling to become the target instead.

trait.name: Keen Smell
entries: The ratling has {@variantrule Advantage|XPHB} on Wisdom ({@skill Perception|XPHB}) checks that rely on smell.

trait.name: Pack Tactics
entries: The ratling has {@variantrule Advantage|XPHB} on attack rolls against a creature if at least one of the ratling's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally doesn't have the {@condition Incapacitated|XPHB} condition.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The ratling makes three Repeating Crossbow attacks.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 7}, reach 5 ft. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d4 + 4}) Piercing damage.

action.name: Repeating Crossbow
entries: {@atkr r} {@hit 7}, range 30/120 ft. {@h}11 ({@damage 1d12 + 4}) Piercing damage, plus 10 ({@damage 3d6}) damage of one of the following types (the ratling's choice each time it attacks): Acid, Cold, Fire, or Poison.

action.name: Delerium Bomb {@recharge 5}
entries: {@actSave dex} {@dc 15}, each creature in a 10-foot radius {@variantrule Sphere [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Sphere} centered on a point the ratling can see within 60 feet. {@actSaveFail} 21 ({@damage 6d6}) Fire damage plus 18 ({@damage 4d8}) Necrotic damage. {@actSaveSuccessOrFail} An {@table Arcane Anomalies|MonstersOfDrakkenheim} occurs in the area.

bonus.name: Ratling Cunning
entries: The ratling takes the {@action Dash|XPHB}, {@action Disengage|XPHB}, or {@action Hide|XPHB} action.

reaction.name: Covering Fire
entries: {@actTrigger} A creature reduces an ally the ratling can see to 0 {@variantrule Hit Points|XPHB}. {@actResponse} The ratling makes a ranged attack against that creature.

trait.name: Keen Smell
entries: The ratling has {@variantrule Advantage|XPHB} on Wisdom ({@skill Perception|XPHB}) checks that rely on smell.

trait.name: Pack Tactics
entries: The ratling has {@variantrule Advantage|XPHB} on attack rolls against a creature if at least one of the ratling's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally doesn't have the {@condition Incapacitated|XPHB} condition.

action.name: Poison-Tipped Spear
entries: {@atkr m,r} {@hit 4}, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) Piercing damage plus 10 ({@damage 3d6}) Poison damage.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 4}, reach 5 ft. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) Piercing damage.

bonus.name: Shield Shove
entries: {@actSave str} {@dc 13}, one creature within reach of the ratling. {@actSaveFail} The target is pushed 5 feet away from the ratling and has the {@condition Prone|XPHB} condition.

trait.name: Keen Smell
entries: The ratling has {@variantrule Advantage|XPHB} on Wisdom ({@skill Perception|XPHB}) checks that rely on smell.

trait.name: Pack Tactics
entries: The ratling has {@variantrule Advantage|XPHB} on attack rolls against a creature if at least one of the ratling's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally doesn't have the {@condition Incapacitated|XPHB} condition.

action.name: Contaminated Blade
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 5}, reach 5 ft. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) Piercing damage. {@actSave con} {@dc 10}. {@actSaveFail} 14 ({@damage 4d6}) Necrotic damage. Failure by 5 or More: The target also gains one {@condition Contamination|MonstersOfDrakkenheim} level. {@actSaveSuccess} Half damage only.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 5}, reach 5 ft. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d4 + 3}) Piercing damage.

action.name: Hand Crossbow
entries: {@atkr r} {@hit 5}, range 30/120 ft. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) Piercing damage plus 10 ({@damage 3d6}) Poison damage.

bonus.name: Ratling Cunning
entries: The ratling takes the {@action Dash|XPHB}, {@action Disengage|XPHB}, or {@action Hide|XPHB} action.

trait.name: Keen Smell
entries: The ratling has {@variantrule Advantage|XPHB} on Wisdom ({@skill Perception|XPHB}) checks that rely on smell.

trait.name: Plaguebringer Aura
entries: {@actSave con} {@dc 14}, a creature that starts its turn within 5 feet of the ratling. {@actSaveFail} 5 ({@damage 1d10}) Necrotic damage.

action.name: Filthy Blade
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 7}, reach 5 ft. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d4 + 4}) Piercing damage plus 10 ({@damage 3d6}) Necrotic damage.

action.name: Infection (3/Day)
entries: The ratling causes one creature it can see within 60 feet to be infected with a disease. At the start of each of its turns, the target is subjected to the following effect. Constitution SavingThrow: {@dc 14}. {@actSaveFail} 13 ({@damage 2d12}) Necrotic damage. {@actSaveSuccess} Half damage. After three successes, the disease ends. {@actSaveSuccessOrFail} A {@spell Lesser Restoration|XPHB} spell ends the disease early.

action.name: Metastasize
entries: {@actSave con} {@dc 14}, one creature within 15 feet that is infected with a disease. {@actSaveFail} The target has one of the following conditions (the ratling's choice): {@condition Addled|MonstersOfDrakkenheim}, {@condition Clumsy|MonstersOfDrakkenheim}, or {@condition Enfeebled|MonstersOfDrakkenheim} (save ends). The condition immediately ends and is replace by a new condition if the ratling uses Metastasize on the target again. {@actSaveSuccessOrFail} 9 ({@damage 2d8}) Necrotic damage.

bonus.name: Rampant Sickness
entries: The ratling spreads its Infection from an infected target to another creature adjacent to that target.

trait.name: Keen Smell
entries: The ratling has {@variantrule Advantage|XPHB} on Wisdom ({@skill Perception|XPHB}) checks that rely on smell.

trait.name: Pack Tactics
entries: The ratling has {@variantrule Advantage|XPHB} on attack rolls against a creature if at least one of the ratling's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally doesn't have the {@condition Incapacitated|XPHB} condition.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 4}, reach 5 ft. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) Piercing damage.

action.name: Sling
entries: {@atkr r} {@hit 4}, range 30/120 ft. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) Piercing damage.

bonus.name: Ratling Cunning
entries: The ratling takes the {@action Dash|XPHB}, {@action Disengage|XPHB}, or {@action Hide|XPHB} action.

trait.name: Writhing Aura
entries: The ground within 30 feet of the ravenous flora is filled with plant roots and becomes {@variantrule Difficult Terrain|XPHB}. A creature that starts its turn in the aura takes 7 ({@damage 2d6}) Poison damage.

trait.name: Poison Ivy
entries: If the ravenous flora would take Poison damage, it instead takes no damage and regains {@variantrule Hit Points|XPHB} equal to the Poison damage it would have received.

action.name: The ravenous flora always takes its turn on Initiative count 20
entries: On its turn, the ravenous flora can use its movement and interaction as normal. However, it does not take an action or {@variantrule Bonus Action|XPHB} on its turn unless forced to do so by a spell or other effect. Instead, the ravenous flora takes one of the following {@variantrule Epic Action|MonstersOfDrakkenheim|Epic Actions} at the end of each player character's turn:

items.name: Bite
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 7}, reach 10 ft. {@h}9 ({@damage 1d10 + 4}) Piercing damage, and the target has the {@condition Grappled|XPHB} condition (escape {@dc 15}). Until this grapple ends, the target has the {@condition Restrained|XPHB} condition and the ravenous flora can't Bite another target.

items.name: Spit Acid
entries: {@atkr r} {@hit 7}, range 150/600 ft. {@h}14 ({@damage 3d6 + 4}) Acid damage, and the target has the {@condition Burning|MonstersOfDrakkenheim} condition ({@dice 2d4} Acid). While {@condition Burning|MonstersOfDrakkenheim}, the target has the {@condition Blinded|XPHB} condition.

items.name: Swallow
entries: The ravenous flora makes one Bite attack against a Medium or smaller target it has {@condition Grappled|XPHB}. If the attack hits, the target is swallowed and the grapple ends. The swallowed target has the {@condition Blinded|XPHB} and {@condition Restrained|XPHB} conditions, has {@variantrule Cover|XPHB|Total Cover} from attacks and effects outside the flora, and takes 10 ({@damage 3d6}) Acid damage at the start of each of its turns. The flora can have up to four targets swallowed at a time.

If the flora takes 15 damage or more on a single turn from a creature inside it, it must succeed on a {@dc 16} Constitution saving throw at the end of that turn or regurgitate all swallowed creatures, which land with the {@condition Prone|XPHB} condition in unoccupied spaces within 10 feet of it. If the flora dies, a swallowed creature no longer has the {@condition Restrained|XPHB} condition and can escape from the corpse using 5 feet of movement, exiting with the {@condition Prone|XPHB} condition.

action.name: Hypnotic Pollen (1/Round)
entries: {@actSave wis} {@dc 16}, each creature in a 60-foot {@variantrule Emanation [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Emanation} originating from the ravenous flora. {@actSaveFail} 9 ({@damage 2d8}) Psychic damage, and the target has the {@condition Weakened|MonstersOfDrakkenheim} condition (save ends). While {@condition Weakened|MonstersOfDrakkenheim}, the target must spend all of its movement on each of its turns to move directly toward the ravenous flora. During this movement, the target ignores {@variantrule Difficult Terrain|XPHB} caused by the flora's Writhing Aura.

action.name: Epic Resistance
entries: The ravenous flora chooses one condition, spell, or other effect currently affecting them and rolls {@dice 1d20}. On an 11+, the effect ends on it. The ravenous flora can use this action even if it would otherwise be unable to take actions, its actions are being controlled by another creature, or if a spell or effect alters its game statistics.

trait.name: Pack Tactics
entries: The ghoul has {@variantrule Advantage|XPHB} on attack rolls against a creature if at least one of the ghoul's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally doesn't have the {@condition Incapacitated|XPHB} condition.

action.name: Rancid Bite
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 5}, reach 5 ft. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) Piercing damage plus 10 ({@damage 3d6}) Poison damage.

bonus.name: Aggressive
entries: The ghoul moves up to its {@variantrule Speed|XPHB} toward a {@variantrule Hostile [Attitude]|XPHB|Hostile} creature it can see.

trait.name: Immutable Form
entries: The reality cyst is immune to any spell or effect that would alter its form.

trait.name: Unhinged Reality
entries: The reality cyst emits a 120-foot {@variantrule Emanation [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Emanation} of unhinged reality. A creature that starts its turn in the {@variantrule Emanation [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Emanation} is subjected to the following effect. {@actSave wis} {@dc 15}. {@actSaveFail} The target has the {@condition Immobilized|MonstersOfDrakkenheim} condition until it leaves the {@variantrule Emanation [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Emanation}. While {@condition Immobilized|MonstersOfDrakkenheim}, the target believes itself to be in an altered and confused environment of shifting forms, and can't see or hear anything else. The target does not perceive itself to be stationary, and instead believes it is walking through a bizarre landscape. It can take an action on its turn to repeat the save, ending the effect on itself on a success. If the creature succeeds on its save or the effect ends for it, it is immune to the reality cyst's Unhinged Reality for 24 hours.

trait.name: Unusual Nature
entries: The reality cyst doesn't require air, food, drink, or sleep.

action.name: Psychic Whip
entries: {@atkr m,r} {@hit 7}, reach 5 ft. or range 120 ft. {@h}19 ({@damage 4d6 + 5}) Psychic damage, and the target has the {@condition Dazed|MonstersOfDrakkenheim} condition until the end of the reality cyst's next turn. The reality cyst can target a creature {@condition Immobilized|MonstersOfDrakkenheim} by its Unhinged Reality with this attack even if the creature has {@variantrule Cover|XPHB|Total Cover}.

bonus.name: Feed
entries: Each creature {@condition Immobilized|MonstersOfDrakkenheim} by Unhinged Reality takes 10 ({@damage 3d6}) Psychic damage. The reality cyst regains {@variantrule Hit Points|XPHB} equal to the total damage dealt, and its {@variantrule Hit Points|XPHB|Hit Point} Maximum increases by the same amount.

reaction.name: Fracture
entries: {@actTrigger} The reality cyst takes damage. {@actResponse d}{@actSave int} {@dc 15}, each creature in a 60-foot {@variantrule Emanation [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Emanation} originating from the reality cyst. {@actSaveFail} The target has the {@condition Addled|MonstersOfDrakkenheim} condition (save ends).

monster.name: Reautomata
languages: understands the languages it knew in life but can't speak

trait.name: Relentless Endurance
entries: If damage reduces the reautomata to 0 {@variantrule Hit Points|XPHB}, it must make a Constitution saving throw with a DC of 5 plus the damage taken, unless the damage is from a {@variantrule Critical Hit|XPHB}. On a success, the reautomata drops to 1 {@variantrule Hit Points|XPHB|Hit Point} instead.

trait.name: Standing Leap
entries: The reautomata's {@variantrule Long Jump|XPHB} is up to 50 feet and its {@variantrule High Jump|XPHB} is up to 30 feet, with or without a running start.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The reautomata makes two Arm Blade attacks and one Entrapping Rend attack.

action.name: Arm Blade
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 9}, reach 5 ft. {@h}15 ({@damage 3d6 + 5}) Slashing damage, and if the target is Large or smaller, it is pushed up to 5 feet away from the reautomata and has the {@condition Prone|XPHB} condition.

action.name: Entrapping Rend
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 9}, reach 5 ft., one {@condition Prone|XPHB} target. {@h}15 ({@damage 3d6 + 5}) Piercing damage, and if the target is Large or smaller, it has the {@condition Grappled|XPHB} condition (escape {@dc 17}). While {@condition Grappled|XPHB}, the target has the {@condition Restrained|XPHB} condition and the reautomata can't make Entrapping Rend attacks against another target.

bonus.name: Aggressive
entries: The reautomata moves up to its {@variantrule Speed|XPHB} toward a {@variantrule Hostile [Attitude]|XPHB|Hostile} creature it can see. This movement doesn't provoke {@action Opportunity Attack|XPHB} action.

monster.name: Reautomata Wrecker
languages: understands the languages it knew in life but can't speak

trait.name: Siege Monster
entries: The reautomata deals double damage to objects and structures.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The reautomata makes one Drill attack and one Wrecking Ball attack.

action.name: Drill
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 12}, reach 5 ft. {@h}21 ({@damage 4d6 + 7}) Piercing damage.

action.name: Wrecking Ball
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 12}, reach 20 ft. {@h}21 ({@damage 4d6 + 7}) Bludgeoning damage. {@actSave str} {@dc 20}. {@actSaveFail} The target has the {@condition Dazed|MonstersOfDrakkenheim} condition (save ends) and the {@condition Prone|XPHB} condition.

action.name: Destructive Rampage {@recharge}
entries: The reautomata moves up to its {@variantrule Speed|XPHB} in a straight line, moving through the space of any Medium or smaller creature on its path. The first time its enters each creature's space during this move, it can make a Drill or Wrecking Ball attack against that creature.

bonus.name: Overdrive Engine (1/Day; {@status Bloodied|XPHB} Only)
entries: The reautomata's Destructive Rampage recharges, and it gains {@variantrule Immunity|XPHB} to all damage and conditions until the end of its next turn. For the duration, the reautomata automatically succeeds on all saving throws and Strength, Dexterity, and Constitution-based ability checks and has {@variantrule Advantage|XPHB} on attack rolls. It can't be forced to move or affected by spells of level 8 or lower unless it chooses to be. Features and effects that ignore {@variantrule Resistance|XPHB|Resistances} and {@variantrule Immunity|XPHB|Immunities}, such as a Vorpal Weapon, don't function against the reautomata unless those effects are caused by a level 9 spell or an artifact.

At the end of its next turn, the reautomata dies and explodes. {@actSave dex} {@dc 20}, each creature in a 20-foot {@variantrule Emanation [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Emanation} originating from the reautomata when it dies. {@actSaveFail} 20 ({@damage 8d4}) Acid damage plus 36 ({@damage 8d8}) Necrotic damage. {@actSaveSuccess} Half damage.

trait.name: Ascendant Transformation
entries: When Vladimir von Drakken drops to 0 {@variantrule Hit Points|XPHB}, his body explodes in a shower of gore and he reappears in an unoccupied space within 10 feet as Ascendant Vladimir von Drakken. His {@variantrule Initiative|XPHB} doesn't change.

trait.name: Aura of Dread
entries: A creature that starts its turn within 30 feet of Vladimir von Drakken takes 21 ({@damage 6d6}) Necrotic damage.

trait.name: Bloodthirsty
entries: Vladimir von Drakken has {@variantrule Advantage|XPHB} on attack rolls against a target with the {@status Bloodied|XPHB} or {@condition Bleeding|MonstersOfDrakkenheim} condition.

trait.name: Daywalker
entries: Vladimir von Drakken doesn't possess any Vampire Weaknesses from the Monsters of Drakkenheim.

trait.name: Regeneration
entries: Vladimir von Drakken regains 30 {@variantrule Hit Points|XPHB} at the start of his turn if he has at least 1 {@variantrule Hit Points|XPHB|Hit Point} remaining.

trait.name: Spider Climb
entries: Vladimir von Drakken can climb difficult surfaces, including along ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

action.name: Vladimir von Drakken always takes his turn on Initiative count 20
entries: On his turn, Vladimir von Drakken can use his movement and interaction as normal. However, he does not take an action or {@variantrule Bonus Action|XPHB} on his turn unless forced to do so by a spell or other effect. Instead, Vladimir von Drakken takes one of the following {@variantrule Epic Action|MonstersOfDrakkenheim|Epic Actions} at the end of each player character's turn:

items.name: Bloodmourne
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 12}, reach 5 ft. {@h}27 ({@damage 6d6 + 6}) Force damage, and the target has the {@condition Bleeding|MonstersOfDrakkenheim} condition ({@dice 4d4}). In addition, Vladimir von Drakken can apply one of the following martial maneuvers to the target:

items.name: Advance
entries: Vladimir von Drakken pushes the target 15 feet, then moves up to 15 feet to an unoccupied space within 5 feet of the target without provoking {@action Opportunity Attack|XPHB} action.

items.name: Hamstring
entries: The target has the {@condition Immobilized|MonstersOfDrakkenheim} condition until the end of its next turn.

items.name: Overpower
entries: The target has the {@condition Staggered|MonstersOfDrakkenheim} condition until the end of its next turn.

items.name: Claws
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 12}, reach 5 ft. {@h}20 ({@damage 4d6 + 6}) Necrotic damage, and if the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it has the {@condition Grappled|XPHB} condition (escape {@dc 20}).

action.name: Bite (1/Round)
entries: {@actSave con} {@dc 20}, one creature within 5 feet that is willing or has the {@condition Grappled|XPHB}, {@condition Incapacitated|XPHB}, or {@condition Restrained|XPHB} condition. {@actSaveFail} 49 ({@damage 14d6}) Necrotic damage, and the target has the {@condition Weakened|MonstersOfDrakkenheim} condition ({@dc 20} Constitution save ends). Vladimir von Drakken regains {@variantrule Hit Points|XPHB} equal to the Necrotic damage dealt. A Humanoid killed by this damage rises on its next turn as a Vampire Spawn under Vladimir von Drakken's control.

action.name: Dominate (1/Round)
entries: {@actSave wis} {@dc 20}, one creature Vladimir von Drakken can see within 120 feet. {@actSaveFail} The target has the {@condition Charmed|XPHB} condition until the end of its next turn. While {@condition Charmed|XPHB}, the target obeys Vladimir von Drakken's commands and can't take Reactions. Failure by 5 or More: The {@condition Charmed|XPHB} condition lasts 24 hours or until Vladimir von Drakken is reduced to 0 {@variantrule Hit Points|XPHB}. Each time the target takes damage, it repeats the save, ending the effect on itself on a success. {@actSaveSuccess} The target has {@variantrule Disadvantage|XPHB} on its next attack roll against Vladimir von Drakken.

action.name: Wing Blast (1/Round)
entries: {@actSave str} {@dc 20}, each creature in a 15-foot {@variantrule Emanation [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Emanation} originating from Vladimir von Drakken. {@actSaveFail} 14 ({@damage 4d6}) Bludgeoning damage, and the target is pushed 10 feet away from Vladimir von Drakken and has the {@condition Prone|XPHB} condition. {@actSaveSuccessOrFail} Before or after using this {@variantrule Epic Action|MonstersOfDrakkenheim}, Vladimir von Drakken can move up to half his {@variantrule Fly Speed|XPHB} without provoking {@action Opportunity Attack|XPHB} action.

action.name: Shadow Step (2/Round)
entries: Vladimir von Drakken teleports to an unoccupied space he can see within 60 feet that is in {@variantrule Dim Light|XPHB} or {@variantrule Darkness|XPHB}. He has {@variantrule Advantage|XPHB} on the next melee attack he makes before the end of this round.

action.name: Shape-Shift (1/Round)
entries: Vladimir von Drakken shape-shifts into a Tiny bat ({@variantrule Speed|XPHB} 5 ft., {@variantrule Fly Speed|XPHB} 30 ft.) or a Medium cloud of mist ({@variantrule Speed|XPHB} 5 ft., {@variantrule Fly Speed|XPHB} 20 ft. [hover]), or he returns to his vampire form. Anything he is wearing transforms with him.

While in bat or mist form, Vladimir von Drakken can't speak. His game statistics, other than his size and {@variantrule Speed|XPHB}, are unchanged, but he can't use {@variantrule Epic Action|MonstersOfDrakkenheim|Epic Actions} other than Shape-Shift and Epic {@variantrule Resistance|XPHB}. While in mist form, Vladimir von Drakken can't speak or manipulate objects, and loses his Aura of Dread. He is weightless and can enter an enemy's space and stop there. If air can pass through a space, the mist can do so, but it can't pass through liquid. He has {@variantrule Resistance|XPHB} to all damage.

action.name: Epic Resistance
entries: Vladimir von Drakken chooses one condition, spell, or other effect currently affecting him and rolls {@dice 1d20}. On an 11+, the effect ends on him. He can use this action even if he would otherwise be unable to take actions, his actions are being controlled by another creature, or if a spell or effect alters his game statistics.

reaction.name: Spell-Reflecting Strike
entries: {@actTrigger} Vladimir von Drakken makes a successful saving throw against a spell, or a spell attack misses him. {@actResponse} Vladimir von Drakken can choose another creature (including the spellcaster) he can see within 120 feet of him. The spell targets the chosen creature instead of Vladimir von Drakken. If the spell forces a saving throw, the chosen creature makes its own save. If the spell was an attack, the attack roll is rerolled against the chosen creature.

monster.name: Ripper
languages: understands the languages it knew in life but can't speak

trait.name: Dismemberment
entries: Creatures killed by attacks made by the ripper can't be restored to life except by a {@spell Resurrection|XPHB} spell or similar magic.

trait.name: Feed on Fear
entries: {@condition Frightened|XPHB} creatures have the {@condition Helpless|MonstersOfDrakkenheim} and {@condition Defenseless|MonstersOfDrakkenheim} conditions against attacks made by the ripper.

trait.name: Insensitive to Pain
entries: Critical Hits against the ripper become normal hits.

action.name: Whirling Bonesaw
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 11}, reach 10 ft. {@h}20 ({@damage 4d6 + 6}) Slashing damage, and the ripper can immediately make another Whirling Bonesaw attack against the same target. This attack ignores {@spell Resistance|XPHB} and {@variantrule Immunity|XPHB} to Slashing damage.

action.name: Gory Display {@recharge 5}
entries: {@actSave wis} {@dc 15}, each creature that can see the ripper. {@actSaveFail} 14 ({@damage 4d6}) Psychic damage, and the target has the {@condition Frightened|XPHB} condition (save ends). While {@condition Frightened|XPHB}, the target's {@variantrule Speed|XPHB} becomes 0 and can't increase.

reaction.name: Unstoppable Lurch
entries: {@actTrigger} A creature deals damage to the ripper. {@actResponse} The ripper moves up to half its {@variantrule Speed|XPHB} toward that creature without provoking {@action Opportunity Attack|XPHB} action. If the ripper ends this movement within reach of the creature, it gains {@variantrule Advantage|XPHB} on its next attack roll against the creature.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: River casts one of the following spells, using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability (spell save {@dc 15}, +7 to spell attacks):

trait.name: Academy Rings (1/Day)
entries: River can cast a spell from Spellcasting without expending a use of it.

action.name: Force Missile
entries: {@atkr r} {@hit 7}, range 120 ft. {@h}28 ({@damage 8d6}) Force damage.

bonus.name: Misty Step {@recharge 5}
entries: River casts {@spell Misty Step|XPHB} using the spellcasting ability from Spellcasting.

reaction.name: River's Contingency
entries: {@actTrigger} River becomes {@status Bloodied|XPHB}. {@actResponse} River casts {@spell Mislead|XPHB} and teleports to an unoccupied space she can see within 30 feet.

trait.name: Death Strike
entries: When the assassin reduces a creature to 0 {@variantrule Hit Points|XPHB}, the creature immediately dies.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The assassin makes three Poison Weapon attacks.

action.name: Poisoned Weapon
entries: {@atkr m,r} {@hit 8}, reach 5 ft. or range 120 ft. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) Piercing damage plus 14 ({@damage 4d6}) Poison damage. Once per turn, the assassin can apply one of the following additional effects to the target:

items.name: Silent Scream
entries: {@actSave int} {@dc 16}. {@actSaveFail} The target has the {@condition Bewildered|MonstersOfDrakkenheim} condition (save ends). While {@condition Bewildered|MonstersOfDrakkenheim}, the target is unable to speak.

items.name: Sap Strength
entries: {@actSave con} {@dc 16}. {@actSaveFail} The target has the {@condition Poisoned|XPHB} condition (save ends). While {@condition Poisoned|XPHB}, the target also has the {@condition Weakened|MonstersOfDrakkenheim} condition.

items.name: Sluggish Sinews
entries: {@actSave str} {@dc 16}. {@actSaveFail} The target has the {@condition Dazed|MonstersOfDrakkenheim} condition (save ends). While {@condition Dazed|MonstersOfDrakkenheim}, the target also has the {@condition Slowed|MonstersOfDrakkenheim} condition.

bonus.name: Cunning Action
entries: The assassin takes the {@action Dash|XPHB}, {@action Disengage|XPHB}, or {@action Hide|XPHB} action.

trait.name: Sanctified by Falling Fire
entries: When the knight dies, its soul is pulled into the {@item crystal|MonstersOfDrakkenheim|delerium crystal} embedded in its chest.

trait.name: Special Immunities
entries: The knight is immune to the {@condition Contamination|MonstersOfDrakkenheim} condition.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The knight makes three Longsword attacks.

action.name: Longsword
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 6}, reach 5 ft. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4}) Slashing damage, or 9 ({@damage 1d10 + 4}) Slashing damage if wielded with two hands, plus 9 ({@damage 2d8}) Radiant damage.

bonus.name: Lay on Hands (3/Day)
entries: The knight touches another creature. The target regains 11 ({@dice 2d8 + 2}) {@variantrule Hit Points|XPHB} and is cured of one disease or the {@condition Poisoned|XPHB} condition.

reaction.name: Deny the Witch (3/Day)
entries: {@actTrigger} A creature the knight can see within 60 feet of it casts a spell. {@actResponse} If the spell is level 3 or lower, the spell fails, but no resources are wasted.

trait.name: Sanctified by Falling Fire
entries: When the monk dies, its soul is pulled into the {@item crystal|MonstersOfDrakkenheim|delerium crystal} embedded in its chest.

trait.name: Special Immunities
entries: Sanctified Monk is immune to the {@condition Contamination|MonstersOfDrakkenheim} condition.

trait.name: Unarmored Defense
entries: While the monk is wearing no armor and wielding no shield, its AC includes its Wisdom modifier (included above).

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The monk makes three {@variantrule Unarmed Strike|XPHB} attacks or five Dart attacks.

action.name: Unarmed Strike
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 6}, reach 5 ft. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4}) Bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Dart
entries: {@atkr r} {@hit 6}, range 20/60 ft. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d4 + 4}) Piercing damage.

bonus.name: Flame Step
entries: The monk teleports to an unoccupied space it can see within 60 feet that is in {@variantrule Bright Light|XPHB}. It gains {@variantrule Advantage|XPHB} on its next melee attack.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The sanctified soul casts one of the following spells, using Wisdom as the spellcasting ability (spell save {@dc 15}, +7 to spell attacks):

trait.name: Sanctified by Falling Fire
entries: When the sanctified soul dies, its soul is pulled into the {@item crystal|MonstersOfDrakkenheim|delerium crystal} embedded in its chest.

trait.name: Special Immunities
entries: The sanctified soul is immune to the {@condition Contamination|MonstersOfDrakkenheim} condition.

action.name: Quarterstaff
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 4}, reach 5 ft. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d6 + 1}) Bludgeoning damage, or 5 ({@damage 1d8 + 1}) Bludgeoning damage if wielded with two hands.

action.name: Guiding Bolt
entries: {@atkr r} {@hit 5}, range 120 ft. {@h}14 ({@damage 4d6}) Radiant damage.

reaction.name: Flash of Light
entries: {@actTrigger} A creature the sanctified soul can see makes an attack roll. {@actResponse} The sanctified soul imposes {@variantrule Disadvantage|XPHB} on the attack roll.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The vampire casts one of the following spells, requiring no Material components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save {@dc 15}, +7 to spell attacks):

trait.name: Regeneration
entries: The vampire regains 10 {@variantrule Hit Points|XPHB} at the start of its turn if it has at least 1 {@variantrule Hit Points|XPHB|Hit Point} and isn't in sunlight or running water. If the vampire takes Radiant damage or damage from holy water, this trait doesn't function at the start of the vampire's next turn.

trait.name: Spider Climb
entries: The vampire can climb difficult surfaces, including along ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

trait.name: Vampire Weaknesses
entries: The vampire has the traits described in the "Vampire Weaknesses" sidebar in the Monsters of Drakkenheim.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The vampire makes two attacks and uses Feast, if available. It can replace one attack with a use of Spellcasting.

action.name: Blood Drain
entries: {@atkr m,r} {@hit 7}, reach 5 ft. or range 60 ft. {@h}21 ({@damage 5d6 + 4}) Necrotic damage, and the vampire regains {@variantrule Hit Points|XPHB} equal to the damage dealt. The target has the {@condition Weakened|MonstersOfDrakkenheim} condition ({@dc 15} Constitution save ends).

action.name: Feast {@recharge 5}
entries: {@actSave wis} {@dc 15}, each creature in a 30-foot {@variantrule Emanation [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Emanation} originating from the vampire. {@actSaveFail} 14 ({@damage 4d6}) Necrotic damage plus 14 ({@damage 4d6}) Psychic damage. {@actSaveSuccess} Half damage. {@actSaveSuccessOrFail} The vampire regains {@variantrule Hit Points|XPHB} equal to the Necrotic damage dealt.

reaction.name: Arcane Denial
entries: {@actTrigger} A creature the vampire can see within 60 feet casts a spell of level 3 or lower. {@actResponse d}{@actSave con} {@dc 15}. {@actSaveFail} The spell fails, but no resources are wasted.

monster.name: Scrap Reautomata
languages: understands the languages it knew in life but can't speak

trait.name: Combustion
entries: While the reautomata has the {@condition Burning|MonstersOfDrakkenheim} condition, its {@variantrule Speed|XPHB} becomes 50 feet and its melee weapon attacks deal an extra 10 ({@damage 3d6}) Fire damage.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The reautomata makes two attacks.

action.name: Rusty Weapon
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 6}, reach 5 ft. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) Slashing damage.

bonus.name: Ignition (Recharges after a Short Rest)
entries: The reautomata has the {@condition Burning|MonstersOfDrakkenheim} condition ({@dice 2d6} Fire).

trait.name: Fully Contaminated
entries: The sentient planetoid is immune to {@condition Contamination|MonstersOfDrakkenheim} and has {@variantrule Advantage|XPHB} on saving throws against contaminated spells. The sentient planetoid may cast contaminated spells even though it does not gain {@condition Contamination|MonstersOfDrakkenheim} levels.

trait.name: Delerium Healing
entries: As an action, the sentient planetoid can touch a delerium shard to regain 10 ({@dice 3d6}) {@variantrule Hit Points|XPHB}. Once the sentient planetoid has used a delerium shard in this way, the shard can't be used in this manner again for 24 hours.

trait.name: Alien Intellect
entries: The sentient planetoid is immune to any effect that would sense its emotions or read its thoughts, as well as any divination spell that it refuses. Wisdom ({@skill Insight|XPHB}) checks made to ascertain the sentient planetoid's intentions or sincerity have {@variantrule Disadvantage|XPHB}.

trait.name: Beyond Space and Time
entries: The sentient planetoid always acts on {@variantrule Initiative|XPHB} count 20. Additionally, it can't be moved, teleported, or sent to another plane of existence against its will.

trait.name: Gravitational Pull
entries: The sentient planetoid exerts its own force of gravity in a 100-foot {@variantrule Emanation [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Emanation}. A creature that starts its turn in the {@variantrule Emanation [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Emanation} falls towards the sentient planetoid, taking falling damage as appropriate if it collides with the planetoid. A creature can make a {@dc 22} Dexterity saving throw to grab onto a fixed object it can reach, avoiding the fall on a success.

trait.name: Immutable Form
entries: The sentient planetoid is immune to any spell or effect that would alter its form.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The sentient planetoid has {@variantrule Advantage|XPHB} on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The sentient planetoid makes four attacks, only one of which can be an Unfathomable Knowledge attack.

action.name: Unfathomable Knowledge
entries: {@atkr m,r} {@hit 14}, reach 5 ft. or range 250 ft. {@h}39 ({@damage 6d12}) Psychic damage, and the target has the {@condition Addled|MonstersOfDrakkenheim} and {@condition Weakened|MonstersOfDrakkenheim} conditions until the end of its next turn.

action.name: Crashing Comet
entries: {@atkr r} {@hit 14}, range 150 ft. {@h}27 ({@damage 6d8}) Bludgeoning damage, and the target has the {@condition Burning|MonstersOfDrakkenheim} condition ({@dice 3d8} Fire).

action.name: All-Knowing Magic {@recharge 5}
entries: The sentient planetoid casts any spell of level 5 or lower, using Intelligence as its spellcasting ability (spell save {@dc 22}, +14 to spell attacks).

trait.name: Instinctive Ambusher
entries: At the start of the sewer thing's first turn of each combat, if the sewer thing attacks a creature, it can make one additional Tendril Lash attack as part of its Multiattack action.

trait.name: Poison Absorption
entries: Whenever the sewer thing takes Poison damage, it takes no damage and regains a number of {@variantrule Hit Points|XPHB} equal to the Poison damage dealt.

trait.name: Toxic Aura
entries: A creature that starts its turn within 5 feet of the sewer thing is subjected to the following effect. {@actSave con} {@dc 12}. {@actSaveFail} 5 ({@damage 1d10}) Poison damage.

trait.name: Unexpected Appearance
entries: If the sewer thing is motionless at the start of combat, it has {@variantrule Advantage|XPHB} on its {@variantrule Initiative|XPHB} roll. Additionally, if a creature hasn't observed the sewer thing move or act, that creature must succeed on a {@dc 18} Intelligence ({@skill Investigation|XPHB}) check to discern that the sewer thing is animate.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The sewer thing makes two attacks and uses Engulf.

action.name: Tendril Lash
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 8}, reach 30 ft. {@h}14 ({@damage 2d8 + 5}) Bludgeoning damage, and the target has the {@condition Grappled|XPHB} condition (escape {@dc 16}).

action.name: Reel
entries: The sewer thing pulls each creature {@condition Grappled|XPHB} by it up to 20 feet straight toward it.

action.name: Engulf
entries: The sewer thing engulfs a Medium or smaller creature within 5 feet of it that is {@condition Grappled|XPHB} by it. The grapple ends. The target has the {@condition Blinded|XPHB} and {@condition Restrained|XPHB} conditions, is suffocating, and is subjected to the following effect at the start of each of the sewer thing's turns. {@actSave con} {@dc 16}. {@actSaveFail} 11 ({@damage 2d10}) Poison damage plus 11 ({@damage 2d10}) Acid damage.

If the sewer thing moves, the target moves with it. The sewer thing can have up to four creatures engulfed at a time. An engulfed creature can take an action to escape with a successful {@dc 16} Strength ({@skill Athletics|XPHB}) check, landing in an unoccupied space within 5 feet of the sewer thing.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The manticore makes two Claw attacks and one Stinger attack

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 7}, reach 5 ft. {@h}9 ({@damage 1d10 + 4}) Piercing damage.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 7}, reach 5 ft. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) Slashing damage. If the manticore flies 30+ feet straight toward the target immediately before the hit, the target has the {@condition Prone|XPHB} condition and the manticore can make a Bite attack against it as a {@variantrule Bonus Action|XPHB}.

action.name: Stinger
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 7}, reach 20 ft. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) Piercing damage. {@actSave con} {@dc 15}. {@actSaveFail} 24 ({@damage 7d6}) Necrotic damage. Failure by 5 or More: The target also gains one {@condition Contamination|MonstersOfDrakkenheim} level. {@actSaveSuccess} Half damage only.

action.name: Wing Shards {@recharge 5}
entries: {@actSave dex} {@dc 15}, each creature in a 20-foot {@variantrule Emanation [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Emanation} originating from the manticore (flying creatures have {@variantrule Disadvantage|XPHB}). {@actSaveFail} 28 ({@damage 8d6}) Piercing damage, and if the target is flying, it has the {@condition Prone|XPHB} condition. {@actSaveSuccess} Half damage only.

trait.name: Holy Weapons
entries: When the cavalier hits with any weapon, the weapon deals an extra 9 ({@damage 2d8}) Radiant damage (included in the attack).

trait.name: Skilled Rider
entries: While mounted, the cavalier can force an attack that targets its mount to target the cavalier instead.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The cavalier makes two attacks.

action.name: Lance
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 7} (with {@variantrule Disadvantage|XPHB} against a target within 5 feet), reach 10 ft. {@h}10 ({@damage 1d12 + 4}) Force damage plus 9 ({@damage 2d8}) Radiant damage.

action.name: Javelin
entries: {@atkr m,r} {@hit 7}, reach 5 ft. or range 30/120 ft. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) Force damage plus 9 ({@damage 2d8}) Radiant damage.

bonus.name: Summon Steed (1/Day)
entries: The cavalier magically summons a Griffon, which appears in an unoccupied space within 60 feet of the cavalier and obeys its commands. The steed takes its turn immediately before or after the cavalier. It remains until it or the cavalier dies, or the cavalier dismisses it as a {@variantrule Bonus Action|XPHB}.

trait.name: Holy Weapons
entries: When the paladin hits with any weapon, the weapon deals an extra 9 ({@damage 2d8}) Radiant damage (included in the attack).

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The paladin makes two attacks.

action.name: Longsword
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 6}, reach 5 ft. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4}) Force damage, or 9 ({@damage 1d10 + 4}) Force damage if wielded with two hands, plus 9 ({@damage 2d8}) Radiant damage.

action.name: Javelin
entries: {@atkr m,r} {@hit 6}, reach 5 ft. or range 30/120 ft. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) Force damage plus 9 ({@damage 2d8}) Radiant damage.

bonus.name: Lay on Hands (3/Day)
entries: The paladin touches another creature. The target regains 11 ({@dice 2d8 + 2}) {@variantrule Hit Points|XPHB} and is cured of one disease or the {@condition Poisoned|XPHB} condition.

reaction.name: Deny the Witch (3/Day)
entries: {@actTrigger} A creature the paladin can see within 60 feet casts a spell. {@actResponse} If the spell is level 3 or lower, the spell fails, but no resources are wasted.

trait.name: For the Flame! (3/Day)
entries: The recruit can take an additional Multiattack action on its turn.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The recruit makes two attacks using its Longsword or Shortbow in any combination.

action.name: Longsword
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 5}, reach 5 ft. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) Slashing damage, or 8 ({@damage 1d10 + 3}) Slashing damage if wielded with two hands.

action.name: Shortbow
entries: {@atkr r} {@hit 4}, range 80/320 ft. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) Piercing damage.

action.name: Shield Bash
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 5}, reach 5 ft. {@h}The target is pushed 5 feet away from the recruit and has the {@condition Staggered|MonstersOfDrakkenheim} condition (save ends).

reaction.name: Parry
entries: {@actTrigger} The recruit is hit by a melee attack roll while holding a weapon. {@actResponse} The recruit adds 2 to its AC against that attack, possibly causing it to miss.

trait.name: For the Flame! (1/Day)
entries: The squire can take an additional Multiattack action on its turn.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The squire makes two attacks.

action.name: Shortsword
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 4}, reach 5 ft. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) Piercing damage.

action.name: Shortbow
entries: {@atkr r} {@hit 4}, range 80/320 ft. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) Piercing damage.

action.name: Helping Hand
entries: The squire grants a creature within 5 feet of them {@condition Valor|MonstersOfDrakkenheim} ({@dice 1d4}) until the end of that creature's next turn.

reaction.name: Look Out!
entries: {@actTrigger} An ally within 5 feet of the squire is hit by an attack. {@actResponse} The squire takes the attack's damage instead.

action.name: Claws
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 5}, reach 5 ft. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) Slashing damage.

action.name: Chillsteel Longbow
entries: {@atkr r} {@hit 5}, range 150/600 ft. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) Piercing damage plus 10 ({@damage 3d6}) Cold damage. Critical {@h}The target has the {@condition Frozen|MonstersOfDrakkenheim} condition ({@dc 10}).

bonus.name: Steady Aim
entries: The skeleton archer grants itself {@variantrule Advantage|XPHB} on its next ranged attack roll this turn. It can use this {@variantrule Bonus Action|XPHB} only if it hasn't moved during this turn, and after it uses this {@variantrule Bonus Action|XPHB}, its {@variantrule Speed|XPHB} becomes 0 and can't increase until the end of this turn.

action.name: Fire Lance
entries: {@atkr m,r} {@hit 5}, reach 5 ft. or range 120 ft. {@h}25 ({@damage 4d10 + 3}) Fire damage, and the target has the {@condition Burning|MonstersOfDrakkenheim} condition ({@dice 1d10} Fire).

action.name: Shocking Arc
entries: {@atkr m,r} {@hit 5}, reach 5 ft. or range 30 ft. {@h}14 ({@damage 2d10 + 3}) Lightning damage. {@actSave con} {@dc 13}. {@actSaveFail} The target has the {@condition Shocked|MonstersOfDrakkenheim} condition (save ends).

action.name: Thunder Blast {@recharge 5}
entries: {@actSave con} {@dc 13}, each creature in a 15-foot {@variantrule Cube [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Cube} originating from the skeleton mage. {@actSaveFail} 13 ({@damage 3d8}) Thunder damage, and the target is pushed 10 feet away from the skeleton mage. {@actSaveSuccess} Half damage only.

bonus.name: Teleport
entries: The skeleton mage teleports to an unoccupied space it can see within 60 feet.

action.name: Poison-Tipped Spear
entries: {@atkr m,r} {@hit 5}, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) Piercing damage plus 10 ({@damage 3d6}) Poison damage.

bonus.name: Shield Slam
entries: {@actSave str} {@dc 13}, one creature within 5 feet of the skeleton soldier. {@actSaveFail} The target is pushed 5 feet away from the skeleton soldier and has the {@condition Prone|XPHB} condition.

trait.name: Amorphous Form
entries: The skin crawler can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch without squeezing.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The skin crawler makes two Claw attacks and one Bind attack.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 4}, reach 5 ft. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d8 + 2}) Slashing damage.

action.name: Bind
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 4}, reach 5 ft. {@h}15 ({@damage 3d8 + 2}) Bludgeoning damage, and if the target is Medium or smaller, it has the {@condition Grappled|XPHB} condition (escape {@dc 12}). While {@condition Grappled|XPHB}, the target has the {@condition Restrained|XPHB} condition and {@variantrule Disadvantage|XPHB} on Strength checks and Strength saving throws, and the skin crawler can't Bind another target.

bonus.name: Crush and Consume
entries: {@actSave str} {@dc 12}, one creature {@condition Grappled|XPHB} by the skin crawler. {@actSaveFail} 10 ({@damage 3d6}) Bludgeoning damage, and the skin crawler regains an equal number of {@variantrule Hit Points|XPHB}. If this damage kills the target, the skin crawler assumes its form. The skin crawler's game statistics are the same in each form. It reverts to its true form if it dies.

trait.name: Pack Tactics
entries: The skinwing has {@variantrule Advantage|XPHB} on attack rolls against a creature if at least one of the skinwing's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally doesn't have the {@condition Incapacitated|XPHB} condition.

trait.name: Disturbing Bleating
entries: A creature that starts its turn within 30 feet of the skinwing is subjected to the following effect. {@actSave wis} {@dc 14}. {@actSaveFail} The target has the {@condition Staggered|MonstersOfDrakkenheim} condition until the start of its next turn. {@actSaveSuccess} The target is immune to the Disturbing Bleating of all skinwings for 24 hours.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The skinwing makes one Bite attack and one Talons attack.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 5}, reach 5 ft. {@h}12 ({@damage 2d8 + 3}) Piercing damage.

action.name: Talons
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 5}, reach 5 ft. {@h}10 ({@damage 2d6 + 3}) Slashing damage.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The skretch makes two attacks.

action.name: Beak
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 5}, reach 5 ft. {@h}8 ({@damage 2d4 + 3}) Piercing damage.

action.name: Spittle
entries: {@atkr r} {@hit 5}, range 120/300 ft., one target directly underneath the skretch. {@h}15 ({@damage 6d4}) Acid damage.

action.name: Expel Waste {@recharge 5}
entries: {@actSave dex} {@dc 13}, each creature in a 10-foot radius {@variantrule Sphere [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Sphere} directly beneath the skretch. {@actSaveFail} 20 ({@damage 8d4}) Acid damage, and the target has the {@condition Burning|MonstersOfDrakkenheim} condition ({@dice 4d4} Acid). Each time the target takes damage from this condition, it must succeed on a {@dc 13} Constitution saving throw or gain one {@condition Contamination|MonstersOfDrakkenheim} level. {@actSaveSuccess} Half damage only.

trait.name: False Appearance
entries: While the skull remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from an ordinary humanoid skull.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 4}, reach 5 ft. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) Piercing damage.

action.name: Disparaging Remarks
entries: {@actSave wis} {@dc 12}, one creature the skull can see within 10 feet. {@actSaveFail} 5 ({@damage 2d4}) Psychic damage, and the target has {@variantrule Disadvantage|XPHB} on the next attack roll it makes before the end of its next turn.

reaction.name: Guiding Words
entries: {@actTrigger} A creature the skull can see within 10 feet makes an ability check. {@actResponse} The target can roll {@dice 1d4} and add the result to that check.

trait.name: Aquatic Camouflage
entries: The leech has {@variantrule Advantage|XPHB} on Dexterity ({@skill Stealth|XPHB}) checks made to hide in aquatic terrain.

trait.name: Spell Glands
entries: The leech has a spell gland, which can store up to ten levels of spells. When encountered, roll {@dice 1d10} to determine how many spell levels it has stored.

action.name: Attach
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 3}, reach 0 ft. {@h}The leech attaches to the target. While attached, the leech doesn't attack, and moves with the target, using none of the leech's movement. The leech can detach itself using 5 feet of movement, and detaches immediately if its blood bags are filled or if the target dies.

A creature within 5 feet can take an action to detach the leech with a successful {@dc 13} Wisdom ({@skill Medicine|XPHB}) check. {@actSaveFail} The leech is still detached, but the target has the {@condition Bleeding|MonstersOfDrakkenheim} condition ({@dice 2d4}). Failure by 5 or More: The leech isn't detached and the target takes 8 ({@damage 2d4 + 3}) Piercing damage.

bonus.name: Spell Drain
entries: The leech can use this {@variantrule Bonus Action|XPHB} only when it is attached to a creature. The attached creature is subjected to the following effect. {@actSave int} {@dc 13}. {@actSaveFail} 10 ({@damage 3d6}) Psychic damage, and the target has the {@condition Bewildered|MonstersOfDrakkenheim} condition until the start of the leech's next turn. If the target has spell slots, the leech drains one randomly determined spell slot which can be no higher than level 3. It then fills its spell glands with the same number of spell levels.

bonus.name: Arcane Transfusion
entries: The leech can use this {@variantrule Bonus Action|XPHB} only when it is attached to a creature and has at least one level worth of spells in its Spell Glands. The leech empties any number of spell levels from its Spell Glands, and the creature it is attached to regains an equal number of spell levels worth of spell slots.

trait.name: Spider Climb
entries: The dreg climb difficult surfaces, including along ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

trait.name: Spiny Body
entries: Any creature grappling the dreg or {@condition Grappled|XPHB} by it takes 5 ({@damage 1d10}) Piercing damage at the end of that creature's turn.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The dreg makes three Spike attacks.

action.name: Spike
entries: {@atkr m,r} {@hit 6}, reach 5 ft., or range 20/60 ft. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d4 + 4}) Piercing damage plus 7 ({@damage 2d6}) Necrotic damage. Critical {@h}{@actSave con} {@dc 10}. {@actSaveFail} The target gains one level of {@condition Contamination|MonstersOfDrakkenheim}.

trait.name: Fully Contaminated
entries: The star warden is immune to {@condition Contamination|MonstersOfDrakkenheim} and has {@variantrule Advantage|XPHB} on saving throws against contaminated spells. The star warden may cast contaminated spells even though it does not gain {@condition Contamination|MonstersOfDrakkenheim} levels.

trait.name: Delerium Healing
entries: As an action, the star warden can touch a delerium shard to regain 10 ({@dice 3d6}) {@variantrule Hit Points|XPHB}. Once the star warden has used a delerium shard in this way, the shard can't be used in this manner again for 24 hours.

trait.name: Alien Intellect
entries: The sentient planetoid is immune to any effect that would sense its emotions or read its thoughts, as well as any divination spell that it refuses. Wisdom ({@skill Insight|XPHB}) checks made to ascertain the sentient planetoid's intentions or sincerity have {@variantrule Disadvantage|XPHB}.

trait.name: Cosmic Aura
entries: A creature that starts its turn within 30 feet of the star warden is subjected to the following effect. {@actSave cha} {@dc 17}. {@actSaveFail} The target is hurled through time and space, witnessing every moment of existence in a single second. It takes 17 ({@damage 5d6}) Psychic damage and is teleported to an unoccupied space it can see within 30 feet.

trait.name: Lords of Time and Space
entries: When the star warden is reduced to 0 {@variantrule Hit Points|XPHB}, roll a {@dice d20}. On a 1 or 20, the star warden regains all of its {@variantrule Hit Points|XPHB} and another creature of its choice within 30 feet is reduced to 0 {@variantrule Hit Points|XPHB} instead.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The star warden makes two attacks.

action.name: Staff of Stars
entries: {@atkr m,r} {@hit 8}, reach 5 ft. or range 60/120 ft. {@h}22 ({@damage 5d6 + 4}) Radiant damage plus 10 ({@damage 3d6}) Force damage.

action.name: Nebulae Grasp
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 8}, reach 5 ft. {@h}27 ({@damage 5d8 + 4}) Piercing damage, and the star warden can teleport the target to an unoccupied space the star warden can see within 120 feet.

action.name: Stardust
entries: {@actSave dex} {@dc 17}, each creature in a 30-foot {@variantrule Cone [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Cone}. {@actSaveFail} 18 ({@damage 4d6 + 4}) Radiant damage and the target has the {@condition Burning|MonstersOfDrakkenheim} condition ({@dice 4d6} Radiant).

bonus.name: The Cold Void of Space
entries: {@actSave con} {@dc 17}, one creature within 120 feet of the star warden that teleported this turn. {@actSaveFail} The target has the {@condition Frozen|MonstersOfDrakkenheim} condition. {@actSaveSuccess} 10 ({@damage 3d6}) Cold damage.

reaction.name: Outside Time and Space
entries: {@actTrigger} A creature hits the star warden with an attack. {@actResponse} The star warden switches places with another creature within 30 feet, and the attack hits that creature instead.

monster.name: Stitcher
languages: understands the languages of its creator but can't speak

trait.name: Hold Still, Please
entries: The stitcher has {@variantrule Advantage|XPHB} on attack rolls against a {@condition Grappled|XPHB}, {@condition Immobilized|MonstersOfDrakkenheim}, or {@condition Slowed|MonstersOfDrakkenheim} creature.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The stitcher makes two Scissorhand attacks and one Sewing Needle attack. It can replace any of these attacks with Attach Limb.

action.name: Scissorhand
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 9}, reach 10 ft. {@h}18 ({@damage 3d8 + 5}) Slashing damage, and the target has the {@condition Bleeding|MonstersOfDrakkenheim} condition ({@dice 4d4}).

action.name: Sewing Needle
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 9}, reach 10 ft. {@h}14 ({@damage 2d8 + 5}) Piercing damage. {@actSave dex} {@dc 17}. {@actSaveFail} The target has a body part bound and sewn up (stitcher's choice):

action.name: Eyes
entries: The target has the {@condition Blinded|XPHB} condition.

action.name: Mouth
entries: The target cannot speak and cannot cast spells with a verbal component.

action.name: Limbs
entries: The target has the {@condition Restrained|XPHB} condition.

A creature within 5 feet can take an action to remove the threads with a successful {@dc 17} Wisdom ({@skill Medicine|XPHB}) check, ending the effect. {@actSaveFail} The threads are removed but the target takes 11 ({@damage 2d10}) Slashing damage. Failure by 5 or More: The target takes 11 ({@damage 2d10}) Slashing damage and the threads aren't removed.

action.name: Attach Limb
entries: {@actSave str} {@dc 17}, one creature the stitcher can see within 10 feet ({@condition Grappled|XPHB}, {@condition Slowed|MonstersOfDrakkenheim}, {@condition Restrained|XPHB}, {@condition Incapacitated|XPHB}, and {@condition Immobilized|MonstersOfDrakkenheim} creatures have {@variantrule Disadvantage|XPHB}). {@actSaveFail} The target makes a {@dc 17} Intelligence saving throw at the start of each of its turns. On a success, it controls the limb until the start of its next turn. Otherwise, the limb is uncontrolled for the same duration. The target suffers one of the following effects depending on the attached limb:

items.name: Head
entries: While controlled, the target has {@variantrule Advantage|XPHB} on Intelligence, Wisdom, and Charisma-based {@variantrule D20 Test|XPHB|D20 Tests}. While uncontrolled, the target can control its action or its movement on its turn, but the head controls the other. On a failure by 5 or more, the head chooses which to control instead of the target.

items.name: Arm
entries: While controlled, the target can take an extra action on its turn, choosing from the Attack (one weapon attack only) or Utilize actions. While uncontrolled, the extra arm makes one melee weapon attack against the target at the start of its turn. The arm has a +9 attack bonus and deals 14 ({@damage 3d6 + 4}) Bludgeoning damage on a hit.

items.name: Leg
entries: While controlled, the target can take an extra action on its turn, choosing from the {@action Dash|XPHB} or {@action Disengage|XPHB} actions. While uncontrolled, the leg forces the target to move up to its {@variantrule Speed|XPHB} in a random direction at the start of its turn. If this movement forces the target toward a hazard or precipice, the host can repeat the saving throw. On a successful save, it stops its movement and has the {@condition Prone|XPHB} condition before entering the hazard.

An attached limb can be attacked (AC 20, 20 {@variantrule Hit Points|XPHB}, {@variantrule Immunity|XPHB} to Poison and Psychic damage). A creature within 5 feet can take an action to remove the limb with a successful {@dc 17} Wisdom ({@skill Medicine|XPHB}) check or {@dc 15} Strength check. When removed by any means other than a successful Wisdom ({@skill Medicine|XPHB}) check, the target takes 18 ({@damage 4d8}) Necrotic damage and has the {@condition Bleeding|MonstersOfDrakkenheim} condition ({@dice 4d4}).

trait.name: Regeneration
entries: The troll regains 10 {@variantrule Hit Points|XPHB} at the start of each of its turns. If the troll takes Acid damage, this trait doesn't function at the start of the troll's next turn. The troll dies only if it starts its turn with 0 {@variantrule Hit Points|XPHB} and doesn't regenerate.

trait.name: Special Immunities
entries: The troll is immune to the {@condition Shocked|MonstersOfDrakkenheim} condition.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The troll makes two Claw attacks and one Bite attack. It can replace its Bite attack with Hurl Lightning if available.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 7}, reach 5 ft. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) Piercing damage plus 9 ({@damage 2d8}) Thunder damage, and the target has the {@condition Staggered|MonstersOfDrakkenheim} condition until the end of the troll's next turn.

action.name: Claws
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 7}, reach 5 ft. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) Slashing damage plus 9 ({@damage 2d8}) Lightning damage, and lightning leaps from the target to a different creature of the troll's choice that it can see within 10 feet of the target. The second creature takes 18 ({@damage 4d8}) Lightning damage.

action.name: Hurl Lightning {@recharge 5}
entries: The troll hurls a magical lightning bolt at a point it can see within 300 feet of it. {@actSave dex} {@dc 16}, each creature in a 10-foot-radius {@variantrule Sphere [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Sphere} centered on that point. {@actSaveFail} 18 ({@damage 4d8}) Lightning damage and has the {@condition Shocked|MonstersOfDrakkenheim} condition until the end of the troll's next turn. {@actSaveSuccess} Half damage only.

trait.name: Blood Frenzy
entries: The striga has {@variantrule Advantage|XPHB} on melee attack rolls against a creature with the {@status Bloodied|XPHB} condition.

trait.name: Fully Contaminated
entries: The striga is immune to {@condition Contamination|MonstersOfDrakkenheim} and has {@variantrule Advantage|XPHB} on saving throws against contaminated spells. It may cast contaminated spells even though it does not gain {@condition Contamination|MonstersOfDrakkenheim} levels.

trait.name: Necrotic Aura
entries: A creature that starts its turn within 30 feet of the Striga takes 10 ({@damage 3d6}) Necrotic damage.

trait.name: Regeneration
entries: The striga regains 10 {@variantrule Hit Points|XPHB} at the start of its turn if it has at least 1 {@variantrule Hit Points|XPHB|Hit Point} and isn't in sunlight or running water. If the striga takes Radiant damage or damage from holy water, this trait doesn't function at the start of the vampire's next turn.

trait.name: Spider Climb
entries: The striga can climb difficult surfaces, including along ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

trait.name: Vampire Weaknesses
entries: The striga has the traits described in the "Vampire Weaknesses" sidebar in the Monsters of Drakkenheim.

action.name: The striga always takes its turn on Initiative count 20
entries: On its turn, the striga can use its movement and interaction as normal. However, it does not take an action or {@variantrule Bonus Action|XPHB} on its turn unless forced to do so by a spell or other effect. Instead, the striga takes one of the following {@variantrule Epic Action|MonstersOfDrakkenheim|Epic Actions} at the end of each player character's turn:

action.name: Necrotic Bite (1/Round)
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 10}, reach 10 ft. {@h}24 ({@damage 4d6 + 6}) Necrotic damage. The target's {@variantrule Hit Points|XPHB|Hit Point} Maximum is reduced by an amount equal to the Necrotic damage taken, and the striga regains {@variantrule Hit Points|XPHB} equal to that amount.

action.name: Claws
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 10}, reach 15 ft. {@h}24 ({@damage 4d6 + 6}) Slashing damage.

action.name: Delerium Healing
entries: The striga touches a delerium shard and regains 10 ({@dice 3d6}) {@variantrule Hit Points|XPHB}. Once the striga has used a delerium shard in this way, it can't be used in this manner again for 24 hours.

action.name: Blood Howl (1/Round)
entries: {@actSave wis} {@dc 18}, each creature in a 30-foot {@variantrule Emanation [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Emanation} originating from the striga that can hear it. {@actSaveFail} 35 ({@damage 10d6}) Psychic damage, and the target has the {@condition Jinxed|MonstersOfDrakkenheim} ({@dice 1d6}) and {@condition Immobilized|MonstersOfDrakkenheim} conditions (save ends both). {@actSaveSuccess} Half damage, and the target is immune to the striga's Blood Howl for 24 hours.

action.name: Charge
entries: The striga moves up to 40 feet in a straight line, moving through the spaces of other creatures. Each creature whose space the striga passes through is subjected to the following effect. {@actSave dex} {@dc 18}. {@actSaveFail} The target is pushed 10 feet away from the striga and has the {@condition Prone|XPHB} condition.

action.name: Epic Resistance
entries: The striga chooses one condition, spell, or other effect currently affecting them and rolls {@dice 1d20}. On an 11+, the effect ends on it. The striga can use this action even if it would otherwise be unable to take actions, its actions are being controlled by another creature, or if a spell or effect alters its game statistics.

reaction.name: Retaliation
entries: {@actTrigger} A creature within 15 feet of the striga deals Radiant damage to it. {@actResponse} The striga makes a Claws attack against that creature.

trait.name: Swarm
entries: The swarm can occupy another creature's space and vice versa, and the swarm can move through any opening large enough for a Tiny insect. The swarm can't regain {@variantrule Hit Points|XPHB} or gain {@variantrule Temporary Hit Points|XPHB}.

action.name: Contaminated Bites
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 4}, reach 0 ft. {@h}10 ({@damage 3d6}) Necrotic damage, or 3 ({@damage 1d6}) Necrotic damage if the swarm has the {@status Bloodied|XPHB} condition. {@actSave con} {@dc 10}. {@actSaveFail} The target gains one {@condition Contamination|MonstersOfDrakkenheim} level.

trait.name: Swarm
entries: The swarm can occupy another creature's space and vice versa, and the swarm can move through any opening large enough for a Small ratling. The swarm can't regain {@variantrule Hit Points|XPHB} or gain {@variantrule Temporary Hit Points|XPHB}.

trait.name: Chittering Mass
entries: The swarm has {@variantrule Advantage|XPHB} on attack rolls against any creature in its space.

trait.name: Scampering Survivors
entries: When the swarm is reduced to 0 {@variantrule Hit Points|XPHB}, it leaves behind {@dice 1d4} {@creature Ratling Warrior|MonstersOfDrakkenheim|Ratling Warriors} in its space.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The swarm makes one Bite attack against each creature in its space.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 6}, reach 0 ft. {@h}28 ({@damage 8d6}) Piercing damage, or 14 ({@damage 4d6}) Piercing damage if the swarm has the {@status Bloodied|XPHB} condition. If the target is a creature, it has the {@condition Grappled|XPHB} condition (escape {@dc 14}).

bonus.name: Scurrying Horde
entries: The swarm takes the {@action Dash|XPHB} action.

monster.name: Tanker
languages: understands the languages of its creator but can't speak

trait.name: Chemical Stench
entries: A creature other than a Construct or Undead that starts its turn within 10 feet of the tanker is subjected to the following effect. {@actSave con} {@dc 15}. {@actSaveFail} The target has the {@condition Sickened|MonstersOfDrakkenheim} condition until the start of its next turn. {@actSaveSuccess} The target is immune to the Chemical Stench of all tankers for 1 hour.

trait.name: Special Immunities
entries: The tanker is immune to the {@condition Burning|MonstersOfDrakkenheim} condition (Acid only).

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The tanker makes two Slam or Chemical Glob attacks.

action.name: Slam
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 7}, reach 10 ft. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d8 + 4}) Bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Chemical Glob
entries: {@atkr r} {@hit 7}, range 60/120 ft. {@h}14 ({@damage 4d6}) Acid, Cold, or Poison damage (tanker's choice).

action.name: Chemical Spray {@recharge 5}
entries: Each creature in a 30-foot {@variantrule Cone [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Cone} is subjected to one of the following effects of the tanker's choice:

items.name: Sulfuric Acid
entries: {@actSave dex} {@dc 15}. {@actSaveFail} 25 ({@damage 10d4}) Acid damage, and the target has the {@condition Burning|MonstersOfDrakkenheim} condition ({@dice 4d4} Acid). {@actSaveSuccess} Half damage only.

items.name: Liquid Nitrogen
entries: {@actSave con} {@dc 15}. {@actSaveFail} 18 ({@damage 4d8}) Cold damage, and the target has the {@condition Frozen|MonstersOfDrakkenheim} condition ({@dc 14}). {@actSaveSuccess} Half damage only.

items.name: Chlorine Gas
entries: {@actSave con} {@dc 15}. {@actSaveFail} 14 ({@damage 4d6}) Poison damage, and the target has the {@condition Poisoned|XPHB} condition (save ends). While {@condition Poisoned|XPHB}, the target has the {@condition Blinded|XPHB} condition. {@actSaveSuccess} Half damage only.

trait.name: Malleable
entries: The dreg can move through a space as narrow as 6 inches wide without expending extra movement to do so.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The dreg makes two Tentacle Slap attacks.

action.name: Tentacle Slap
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 5}, reach 15 ft. {@h}10 ({@damage 2d6 + 3}) Bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Constricting Tentacle
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 5}, reach 15 ft. {@h}10 ({@damage 2d6 + 3}) Bludgeoning damage plus 7 ({@damage 2d6}) Necrotic damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it has the {@condition Grappled|XPHB} condition (escape {@dc 13}). Until this grapple ends, the target has the {@condition Restrained|XPHB} condition, takes 10 ({@damage 2d6 + 3}) Bludgeoning damage plus 7 ({@damage 2d6}) Necrotic damage at the start of each of its turns, and the dreg can't make Constricting Tentacle attacks.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting (1/Round)
headerEntries: The Algorithm casts one of the following spells, requiring no Material components and using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability (spell save {@dc 27}):

trait.name: Electronic Data Network
entries: A creature that starts its turn within 60 feet of the Algorithm takes 21 ({@damage 6d6}) Lightning damage.

trait.name: Immutable Form
entries: The Algorithm is immune to any spell or effect that would alter its form.

trait.name: Predictive Analytics
entries: At the end of each of the Algorithm's turns, it rolls {@dice 1d20} for each player character fighting it. The Algorithm can replace any {@variantrule D20 Test|XPHB} made by it or a creature it can see with one of these predictive rolls. It must choose to do so before the roll, and it can replace a roll in this way only once per turn.
Each predictive roll can be used only once. Any unused predictive rolls are lost at the start of the Algorithm's next turn.

action.name: The Algorithm always takes its turn on Initiative count 20
entries: On its turn, the Algorithm can use its movement and interaction as normal. However, it does not take an action or {@variantrule Bonus Action|XPHB} on its turn unless forced to do so by a spell or other effect. Instead, the Algorithm takes one of the following {@variantrule Epic Action|MonstersOfDrakkenheim|Epic Actions} at the end of each player character's turn:

items.name: Wire
entries: {@actSave dex} {@dc 26}, one creature the Algorithm can see within 60 feet. {@actSaveFail} 21 ({@damage 2d10 + 10}) Force damage, and if the target is a Huge or smaller creature, it has the {@condition Grappled|XPHB} condition (escape {@dc 20}). The Algorithm can grapple up to six creatures at a time.

items.name: Algorithmic Manipulation
entries: {@actSave str} {@dc 26}, one Huge or smaller creature or object the Algorithm can see within 120 feet. {@actSaveFail} The Algorithm moves the target up to 30 feet in any direction, and the target has the {@condition Restrained|XPHB} condition. If the Algorithm lifts the target into the air, it is suspended there. The target remains held until the Algorithm releases it (no action required), uses this {@variantrule Epic Action|MonstersOfDrakkenheim} again, or has the {@condition Incapacitated|XPHB} condition.

items.name: Deatomization
entries: {@actSave con} {@dc 26}, one creature or object the Algorithm can see within 300 feet. {@actSaveFail} 65 ({@damage 10d12}) Necrotic damage. If this damage reduces the target to 0 {@variantrule Hit Points|XPHB}, it dies and its body is reduced to atoms. {@actSaveFail} Half damage.

action.name: Reprogram (1/Round)
entries: {@actSave int} {@dc 26}, one creature {@condition Grappled|XPHB} by the algorithm. {@actSaveFail} 55 ({@damage 10d10}) Piercing damage. If this damage reduces the target to 0 {@variantrule Hit Points|XPHB}, it dies and its brain is replaced with mechanical components. The target reanimates at the start of its next turn as a Construct under the Algorithm's control. It resembles the original creature, but its eyes glow with synthetic green light, and its body is covered in protruding wires, metal scraps, and glowing tubes.

action.name: Assuming Direct Control (1/Round)
entries: The Algorithm targets a Construct within 120 feet and immediately enters and takes control of it. The Algorithm can still use its {@variantrule Epic Action|MonstersOfDrakkenheim|Epic Actions} as normal and replaces the Construct's game statistics with its own, except the Construct's {@variantrule Hit Points|XPHB}. When the Construct is reduced to 0 {@variantrule Hit Points|XPHB}, the Algorithm reemerges in an unoccupied space within 15 feet of it.

action.name: Epic Resistance
entries: The Algorithm chooses one condition, spell, or other effect currently affecting them and rolls {@dice 1d20}. On an 11+, the effect ends on it. The Algorithm can use this action even if it would otherwise be unable to take actions, its actions are being controlled by another creature, or if a spell or effect alters its game statistics.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting (Psionics)
headerEntries: The Duchess casts one of the following spells, requiring no Material components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save {@dc 20}):

trait.name: Amphibious
entries: The Duchess can breathe air and water.

trait.name: Aura of the Deep
entries: A creature that starts its turn within 60 feet of the Duchess takes 14 ({@damage 4d6}) Psychic damage.

trait.name: Delerium Healing
entries: As an action, a creature can touch one of the Duchess's Delerium shards to regain 10 ({@dice 3d6}) {@variantrule Hit Points|XPHB}. Once a Delerium shard restores {@variantrule Hit Points|XPHB} in this way, it can't do so again for 24 hours.

trait.name: Fully Contaminated
entries: The Dutchess is immune to {@condition Contamination|MonstersOfDrakkenheim} and has {@variantrule Advantage|XPHB} on saving throws against contaminated spells. The Dutchess may cast contaminated spells even though it does not gain {@condition Contamination|MonstersOfDrakkenheim} levels.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The Duchess has {@variantrule Advantage|XPHB} on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Moisture Regeneration
entries: The Duchess regains 20 {@variantrule Hit Points|XPHB} at the start of each of her turns if she is submerged at least partially in water. She dies only if she starts her turn at 0 {@variantrule Hit Points|XPHB} and does not regenerate.

action.name: The Duchess always takes her turn on Initiative count 20
entries: On her turn, the Duchess can use her movement and interaction as normal. However, she does not take an action or {@variantrule Bonus Action|XPHB} on her turn unless forced to do so by a spell or other effect. Instead, the Duchess takes one of the following {@variantrule Epic Action|MonstersOfDrakkenheim|Epic Actions} at the end of each player character's turn:

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 12}, reach 10 ft. {@h}16 ({@damage 3d6 + 6}) Piercing damage.

action.name: Tentacle
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 12}, reach 20 ft. {@h}20 ({@damage 4d6 + 6}) Bludgeoning damage, and if the target is a Huge or smaller creature, it has the {@condition Grappled|XPHB} condition (escape {@dc 20}). The Duchess can have up to four creatures {@condition Grappled|XPHB} at a time.

At the start of each of its turns until the grapple ends, the target is subjected to the following effect. {@actSave con} {@dc 17}. {@actSaveFail} The target gains one {@condition Contamination|MonstersOfDrakkenheim} level.

action.name: Fling
entries: One Large or smaller object held or creature {@condition Grappled|XPHB} by the Duchess is thrown up to 60 feet in a direction of the Duchess's choice and has the {@condition Prone|XPHB} condition. If a thrown target strikes a solid surface, the target takes 3 ({@damage 1d6}) Bludgeoning damage for every 10 feet it was thrown. If the target is thrown at another creature, that creature must succeed on a {@dc 20} Dexterity saving throw or take the same damage and have the {@condition Prone|XPHB} condition.

action.name: Deep Domination (1/Round)
entries: {@actSave wis} {@dc 20}, one creature The Duchess can see. {@actSaveFail} The target has the {@condition Charmed|XPHB} condition. The target is under the Duchess's control and can't take Reactions. The Duchess and the target can communicate telepathically over any distance.

Whenever the target takes damage, it repeats the save, ending the effect on itself on a success. On a failure, it gains one {@condition Contamination|MonstersOfDrakkenheim} level. Once every 24 hours, if the creature is at least 1 mile away from the Duchess, it can repeat the saving throw.

If the target undergoes a Monstrous Transformation, it becomes a {@creature Deep Dreg Warrior|MonstersOfDrakkenheim}, a {@creature Deep Knight|MonstersOfDrakkenheim}, or a {@creature Deep Siren|MonstersOfDrakkenheim}, and is forever in thrall to the Duchess.

action.name: Call of the Deep (1/Round)
entries: The Duchess calls forth up to five {@creature Deep Dreg Warrior|MonstersOfDrakkenheim|Deep Dregs} or one {@creature Deep Knight|MonstersOfDrakkenheim}. The creatures appear in unoccupied spaces within 30 feet of the Duchess and remain until destroyed. The creatures act after the Duchess on the same {@variantrule Initiative|XPHB} count and are under her control.

action.name: Epic Resistance
entries: The Duchess chooses one condition, spell, or other effect currently affecting her and rolls {@dice 1d20}. On an 11+, the effect ends on her. The Duchess can use this action even if she would otherwise be unable to take actions, her actions are being controlled by another creature, or if a spell or effect alters her game statistics.

reaction.name: Sacrificial Pawn
entries: {@actTrigger} The Duchess takes damage from an attack. {@actResponse} The Duchess chooses an ally or a creature {@condition Charmed|XPHB} by her to take the attack's damage instead.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting (Psionics; 1/Round)
headerEntries: The Whispered Promise casts one of the following spells, requiring no Material components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save {@dc 25}):

trait.name: Alluring Aura
entries: The Whispered Promise projects a 30-foot {@variantrule Emanation [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Emanation} of beguiling enchantment. A creature that ends its turn in the {@variantrule Emanation [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Emanation} has the {@condition Charmed|XPHB} condition for 1 hour. Each time the creature takes damage other than Psychic damage, it makes a {@dc 25} Wisdom saving throw. On a success, the {@condition Charmed|XPHB} condition ends for that creature, and it is immune to the Alluring Aura of the Whispered Promise for 24 hours.

trait.name: Change Shape
entries: The Whispered Promise has no true form and chooses how they manifest to each creature (no action required). Their form can be anything they wish; they can appear like a creature, object, or even as a multisensory representation of an abstract concept. They can appear to be any form that is Large or smaller, but their game statistics are the same in each form.

trait.name: Inscrutable
entries: The Whispered Promise is immune to any effect that would sense their emotions or read their thoughts, as well as any divination spell that they refuse. Wisdom ({@skill Insight|XPHB}) checks made to ascertain the Whispered Promise's intentions or sincerity have {@variantrule Disadvantage|XPHB}.

trait.name: Glibness
entries: When they make a Charisma ({@skill Deception|XPHB}) check, the Whispered Promise treats any roll of 14 or less on the {@dice d20} as 15.

trait.name: Unravelling Resolve
entries: Creatures {@condition grappled} by the Whispered Promise can't benefit from {@variantrule Resistance|XPHB} and {@variantrule Immunity|XPHB} to Psychic damage or the {@condition Charmed|XPHB} condition.

action.name: The Whispered Promise always takes their turn on Initiative count 20
entries: On their turn, the Whispered Promise can use their movement and interaction as normal. However, they do not take an action or {@variantrule Bonus Action|XPHB} on their turn unless forced to do so by a spell or other effect. Instead, the Whispered Promise takes one of the following {@variantrule Epic Action|MonstersOfDrakkenheim|Epic Actions} at the end of each player character's turn:

items.name: Tendril
